channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- DP300
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- DP300

item.title: CVE-2017-17148|2024-08-05T20:43:59.988Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- dp300
item.description: Huawei DP300 V500R002C00 have a DoS vulnerability due to the lack of validation when the malloc is called. An authenticated local attacker can craft specific XML files to the affected products and parse this file, which result in DoS attacks.

item.title: CVE-2017-17147|2024-08-05T20:43:59.908Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- dp300
item.description: Huawei DP300 V500R002C00 have an integer overflow vulnerability due to the lack of validation. An authenticated local attacker can craft specific XML files to the affected products and parse this file, which result in DoS attacks.

item.title: CVE-2017-17146|2024-08-05T20:43:59.920Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- dp300
item.description: Huawei DP300 V500R002C00 have a buffer overflow vulnerability due to the lack of validation. An authenticated local attacker can craft specific XML files to the affected products and parse this file, which result in DoS attacks or remote code execution on the device.
